resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106772</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106772</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206826</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Madagascar Adventure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Madagaskar Abenteuer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aventure du Madagascar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aventura De Madagascar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Avventura Del Madagascar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιπέτεια της Μαδαγασκάρης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aventura De Madagascar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">explores agricultural practices in Madagascar and analyzes the effects on the people, the environment, and the endangered lemurs. Students then create technology-enhanced presentations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erforscht landwirtschaftliche Praxis in 
Madagaskar und analysiert die Effekte auf die Leute, die Umgebung und 
die gefährdeten lemurs. Kursteilnehmer erstellen dann 
Technologie-erhöhte Darstellungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explore des pratiques agricoles au Madagascar et 
analyse les effets sur le peuple, l'environnement, et les lemurs mis 
en danger. Les étudiants créent alors des présentations 
technologie-mises en valeur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explora práticas agriculturais em Madagascar e 
analisa os efeitos nos povos, no ambiente, e nos lemurs postos em 
perigo. Os estudantes críam então apresentações 
tecnologia-realçadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esplora le pratiche agricole nel Madagascar ed 
analizza gli effetti sulla gente, sull'ambiente e sui lemurs messi. 
Gli allievi allora creano le presentazioni tecnologia-aumentate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερευνά τις γεωργικές πρακτικές στη Μαδαγασκάρη και 
αναλύει τα αποτελέσματα στους ανθρώπους, το περιβάλλον, και 
διακινδυνεμμένη lemurs. Οι σπουδαστές δημιουργούν έπειτα 
τις τεχνολογία-ενισχυμένες παρουσιάσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explora prácticas agrícolas en Madagascar y 
analiza los efectos sobre la gente, el ambiente, y los lemurs puestos 
en peligro. Los estudiantes entonces crean presentaciones 
tecnologi'a-realzadas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206826</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106772</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/madagascar-adventure</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
